privacy.header:
Zasady ochrony prywatności dotyczące konta CompanyAccount

22.05.2014 (Aktualna wersja)
privacy.content:
CompanyAccount is provided to you by AO Kaspersky Lab, located at bldg. 3, 39A, Leningradskoe Shosse, Moscow, 125212 and will be referred to in this document as "we" or "Kaspersky Lab".

We occasionally update our privacy policy without advance notice, so we recommend that you periodically check for changes. Updates to our privacy policy will be published in this section. Please also see our privacy policy regarding basic data (http://www.kaspersky.com/privacy).

We are always happy to clarify:

  • what personal data we collect, store, track, or use
  • who is authorized to request your personal information
  • how you can correct inaccuracies found in this information

By personal data or personal information we mean information that may be used separately or in combination with other information to identify, contact, or locate a particular individual, or identify someone in context.

You can contact us directly at the email addresses indicated at the bottom of this page.

Information we collect and store

Kaspersky Lab respects your desire to protect your personal data. This page describes the information we may request from you as you use CompanyAccount and the situations where we may request it .

You can decide whether to continue actions that require personal information provision. However, please note that if you do not want to provide the required information, you will not be able to perform the associated operation.

Account registration

To use CompanyAccount and access all of its features, you must create:

  • a personal account
  • an account for your company, unless your coworkers have done this previously
This will require that you provide your corporate email address (which will be your username), password, first and last name, company name and country, and your company's license to use Kaspersky Lab applications. We will process and use this information solely for the purpose of providing you with CompanyAccount services and technical support, unless you explicitly choose to have it processed and used for other purposes. After registration your personal account will be linked to your company's account.

If your company's account was previously created, then your registration information (first and last name and corporate email address) will be sent to the CompanyAccount Administrator from your company. The company employee who first registers the company and a personal account is typically designated as the Administrator.

Account settings

You can at any time view, update, correct your account information and password, or delete your account on the "My account" tab. After your account is deleted, your data will be stored by Kaspersky Lab in order to improve customer service, but your ability to access CompanyAccount using that account will be blocked.

Your company's CompanyAccount Administrator will also be able to change your account settings and reset your password.

If you are your company's CompanyAccount Administrator, then you have the ability to edit personal accounts for all of your colleagues and block the entire company's account (employees' personal accounts will remain in the system).

Licenses

You can add and view your company's licenses to Kaspersky Lab products on the "Licenses" tab of your CompanyAccount (activation codes or key files for each product). The license provided during registration will be added automatically to your company's CompanyAccount.

Key files are not physically stored on CompanyAccount. The system only stores a record about your company's license.

Every company employee with a personal account linked to your company's CompanyAccount has access to the list of licenses.

Your CompanyAccount Administrator can remove your company's licenses by deleting them from the list.

Contracts

If your company purchases additional customer support services, then after the purchase has been recorded you will be able to view the list of purchases services on the "Contracts" tab.

The list of contracts will be available to those company employees who were designated as authorized to use the paid service at the time of purchase. These people will automatically receive notifications about the expiration of the contract.

Customer support requests

If you contact Customer Support or the Anti-Virus Lab team for support through CompanyAccount, we may ask you to submit information we may require for providing assistance to you. For example, this may include information about the product associated with your request, computer hardware, your company's network, software, and the nature of the problem you've encountered. Moreover, it may be helpful or even necessary for you to send us the files you are having trouble with or files that define the configuration of your computer or network. You can do this by using the "Attach files" option in the request form. These files may contain user-specific or otherwise personally-identifiable file names, metadata, or content. It is always your choice whether to upload these files. If you would like to upload files, please first view and accept our Regulation on data provisioning on the file upload page.

In order to choose the correct customer support department for your request, we will use information about your company's licenses, country, and possibly the interface language selected in your CompanyAccount.

Your colleagues may have access to your requests if your CompanyAccount Administrator manually changes the corresponding settings (the Administrator can view requests automatically). Access to requests is not limited in time, but the files you upload may be deleted six months after your request is closed.

Security measures we employ

We use standard administrative, physical, and electronic measures to protect received personal information from unauthorized access. We encrypt all personal data transfers using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) technology and store this information only in secure data centers with restricted access.

To whom we can submit personal information

Your data or your company's data is used solely to provide you with the requested service, unless you have given your consent to receive marketing materials or participate in annual user surveys. Please note that we may send your personal information to third parties if legally required to do so by government bodies, courts, or law enforcement agencies, or for public or individual safety, or to prevent or cease activities that we deem unlawful.

Cookies and other technologies

Sometimes Kaspersky Lab may use cookies, web beacons, pixel tags, or similar methods to gather information. For more information, please see our cookie policy.

Statistical information

We may track domain names, IP addresses, Internet providers, browser types, and other client environment information (for example, the model of the device, operating system, screen resolution, etc.) of visitors to our website. We may also collect information about Kaspersky Lab applications you use, which features of the product you use, which web page you opened before visiting our website, the pages of our website that you have visited, the time spent on these pages, the information you searched for on our website, the time and date of your visits, and other statistical information. We use this information to get statistics about the traffic to Kaspersky Lab websites and improve the security and accessibility of our website and services. This information is not correlated with any personal data. We will not request or track your location using information from your device.

Contact information

This information can be found on our Contact information and Legal Statement pages.

If you have any questions or suggestions regarding the protection of your personal data processed in connection with your use of CompanyAccount, please contact us at privacy@kaspersky.com

resetPassword.resetPassword-logout: W celu przywrócenia hasła wyloguj się i ponownie użyj odnośnika
resetPassword.resetPassword-close-session:
Aby zresetować hasło, należy zamknąć wszystkie otwarte sesje CompanyAccount.
Kliknij "Ustaw nowe hasło", aby zamknąć wszystkie sesje i wprowadzić nowe hasło.
lub kliknij "Zapisz bieżące sesje" , aby zapisać wszystkie sesje i zmienić hasło później
Odnośnik służący do resetu hasła będzie aktywny przez 7 dni.

activate.title: Ustaw hasło do Kaspersky CompanyAccount
activate.passwordValidations_lowercaseLetter: Co najmniej jeden znak specjalny (! # + % itp.)
activate.activate-logout: Aby kontynuować aktywację, należy się wylogować.
activate.activate-close-session:
W celu aktywacji konta należy zamknąć wszystkie bieżące sesje CompanyAccount.
Kliknij Aktywuj nowe konto, aby zamknąć wszystkie bieżące sesje i ustawić nowe hasło do swojego konta.
Klknij Zapisz bieżące sesje, aby aktywować swoje konto później.
Odnośnik będzie dostępny przez 7 dni.

create.title: Utwórz konto
create.activationCodeTooltip: Kod aktywacyjny składa się z 4 sektorów po 5 znaków oddzielonych myślnikami: XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX. Nie może zawierać cyfry 0 ani liter I, O, L.

success.title:
Konto użytkownika
zostało utworzone
success.text:
Wiadomość została wysłana na adres {email} .
Skorzystaj z odnośnika znajdującego się w wiadomości,
aby zakończyć rejestrację w Kaspersky CompanyAccount .

create.privacystatement: Akceptuję warunki Oświadczenia o ochronie prywatności.
create.survey-participation: Chcę otrzymywać zaproszenia do corocznych badań satysfakcji Klientów

step1.title: Przywróć hasło do Kaspersky CompanyAccount
step1.description:
Wprowadź adres e-mail podany
podczas tworzenia konta.

step2.title:
Instrukcje dotyczące przywracania hasła
zostały wysłane
step2.description:
Sprawdź swoją skrzynkę {email}
W celu przywrócenia hasła postępuj zgodnie z dostarczonymi instrukcjami.

Jeśli nie otrzymałeś wiadomości, sprawdź poprawność adresu e-mail i spróbuj ponownie.
Jeśli nadal nie otrzymasz wiadomości, skontaktuj się z nami na adres companyaccount@kaspersky.com

deleteCompany.title: Usuń konto firmowe
deleteCompany.description: Po kliknięciu przycisku "Kontynuuj" wszystkie informacje dotyczące konta firmowego zostaną usunięte z CompanyAccount. Użytkownicy z Twojej firmy będą mogli się zalogować, ale informacje o zgłoszeniach, licencjach i umowach będą niedostępne.
